reviewText:
The movie Bernardine (1957) is definitely a Pat Boone musical Classic of the 1950's done in good taste.

I do hope that a VHS copy of this movie comes available like the April Love VHS movie I just purchased through Amazon archives movie assets.
Movie kinda slides by unless you you inhabited that era ... before the hippies and creeps infested the college campuses.  It was a fond flash back memory for me.
Great klitzy 50s movie.  Good quality, fast ship.
